name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. James REVERE, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. James REVERE, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of November, 2003, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby granted, limited to the following issue:
Whether the Superior Court erred in reading an exigent circumstances exception into the probable cause requirement announced by this Court in Commonwealth v. Lovette, 498 Pa. 665, 450 A.2d 975 (1982)
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
835 A.2d 707
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. James REVERE, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 14, 2003.
